text: @realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall It is a shame you couldn’t buy PPE for first responders. BTW, when are you going to update your estimates of US deaths from the Covid-19 virus because nothing says it louder that you have no clue what you are doing than your estimates of Covid deaths. https://t.co/8WX3mOwNi3
